articleContent:
We've received several complaints from Southeast Asian players about unauthorized top-up platforms falsely claiming to be officially authorized. To safeguard your account and assets, please note that currently only the following platforms are officially authorized in the SEA server for payments:

 

- Razer Gold

- Codashop

- Unipin

- BuffBuff

- Smile.one

 

 

Using unauthorized payment platforms may result in financial losses. Please contact our official customer service if you have any related inquiries.
articleTitle: Reminder Regarding Recent Complaints About Unauthorized Payment Platforms
